attributes.action: Ensure that MPs who openly commit financial (or other) criminal offences will be prosecuted as ordinary citizens would be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of all the recent financial offences committed by MPs and cabinet ministers(none of whom have been charged)the govt has to start leading by example,after all if I break the law I can expect to be punished,why should ANYBODY be above the law?

rejection.details: These are matters for the police.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
